ISSUE.TITLE: GenericDictionaryTypeConverter used wrong converter
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: object dictionaryValue = typeConverterKey.ConvertFromInvariantString(keyValueStr[1]); we should use "typeConverterValue" instead of "typeConverterKey"

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Further changes on "Show more detailed information of loaded assemblies"

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #1899 GenericDictionaryTypeConverter class used wrong type converter
